channel.title: Adding models error
channel.description: i added my own custom and got an error normally if i add a custom i don't get an error but this time is unique this is the error: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19094 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:127) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:7990) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:7862) at client.method105(client.java:8168) at client.method36(client.java:1583) at client.method102(client.java:7877) at client.method9(client.java:8760) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:123) at client.run(client.java:4570) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Adding models error
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:4, topic:525477”]looks like the id of the inventory model is wrong, if you’ve got the client to load newer models you might just have to extend the size of the array[/quote]second half is correct.

model exceeds the model index. increase index or decrease model id

looks like the id of the inventory model is wrong, if you’ve got the client to load newer models you might just have to extend the size of the array
